thread.title: Brickworks annual profit down 24 pct

title: Brickworks annual profit down 24 pct
text:
Thu, Sep 24, 2015, 12:32 PM NZST - New Zealand Markets close in 4 hrs 28 mins Brickworks annual profit down 24 pct AAP – 1 hour 4 minutes ago Recommend Print 
Building products group Brickworks says it expects earnings to improve in 2016 on the back of a strong work pipeline and price increases. 
The company on Thursday reported a 24 per cent fall in full year net profit to $78.1 million, hit by impairment charges, but underlying profit was up 18.8 per cent at $120 million. 
The group lifted its final dividend to 30 cents, from 28 cents, a share, fully-franked. @YahooNZBusiness on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook BlackRock cuts stake in BHP AAP 
The world's biggest asset manager, BlackRock, has cut its stake in mining giant BHP Billiton.
